website_summaries.verdict: Engaging kitchen set that has enough Play-Doh and accessories for two children to fully enjoy simultaneously. Achieve exquisite detail with stamps and molds.
pros: Cooking tools are mechanically sophisticated and mimic real-life, especially rolling pin, spatula, and frosting gun
Ideal for kids interested in cooking who want “hands-on” experience in the kitchen without the mess of real food
cons: could be a bit too involved and detail-oriented for children with short attention spans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 3-year-old grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old grandson loves this set. I keep it at my house so he has something fun to play with, and he asks for it a couple times a day. I just set him up in his high chair, pull my chair up next to him and we play. He loves squeezing the Playdoh through the syringe thing to make worms or donuts. Of course he had to use all the colors at the same time, so now his Playdoh has become a nice shade of grey.
customer_reviews.author: Bachan2

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package deal. One con, the box doesn't hold up well and no container comes with it to keep the items organized when not in use. I recommend buying a large pencil box or even using a large tupperware container so the toys don't get separated or lost. The toy is a lot of fun though and keeps my little girl busy. We have her fake cook with the play dough set while we really cook and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: John O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the play-doh
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, so I love it........keeps the kiddos busy making all types of different shapes, characters, and play food. Definitely a good buy, especially with tv and all the technology, kids rather play on an iPad; so taking a break off that sounds good to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio O.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sons 4th birthday. I have four kids from 2-7 and they played for two hours with the playdoh. It arrived on time and was easy to get out of the box. The kids love pretending to be bakers. Great gift and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old granddaughter LOVES this set. Since we make cookies together for holidays often this is a real hit.She has spent hours playing with this..I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Play-Doh cookies
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. It comes with a few different colors of play-doh and different tools to make “cookies” she will spend an hour at a time playing with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set! The roller has imprints on it. The jury is still out on that bit (since you would normally use a smooth roller for cookies). The kids didn't really need cookie cutters, but the tops are flat (easier for pressing downward) and it keeps them out of my collection. Our favorite part is the little mold on the cookie sheet that looks like one of those cream-filled chocolate cookies. Oreos are my daughter's favorite cookies ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I brought this out for my 2 year son and our neighbors' kids (2 yr old and 9 yr old) to play. It kept them occupied for a good 15 minutes at least. I learned not to leave the dough out for too long after they are done playing with it. I put it back in the containers right after they're done playing it. If it's left out for too long, it will be become like a rock. I've had to throw some of it away when I found them hidden in other places by my 2 year old. Toddlers! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Kept my 3yr old neice busy while visiting!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! The Play-Doh formula has improved since my sons played with it. It doesn't stick, is pliable out of the container, and didn't stain. I bought a second set to keep at the house for any future little ones visiting (she took this set home with her).
customer_reviews.author: Alto_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For My Daughter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Playdoh set for my daughter's 7th birthday. She absolutely loved it and she and her 11 year old brother have been playing with it every day since her birthday. This was a total win in my opinion. It was reasonably priced and came quick. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it isn't always the easiest to pick up and get back in the container. Other than that, Playdoh was a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves hers so much we got one as a birthday gift for a neighbor. Just be aware, the Play-Doh are the small containers. I’ve attached a picture of one next to a regular sized Play-Doh.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. My daughter is having a blast with this. The star stamp is her favorite for now. The syringe is very smooth and produces a very nice start shaped noodle. The included roller is also nice. The test has a lot of impressions that can be used to create various food shapes. Overall a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Vamsi

customer_reviews.title: Good ol' Play-Doh!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old granddaughter loves it. It has provided hours of play time, making us "cakes" and "cookies" with this set. It's instilled creativity and helped her learn some new shapes as well, just like I guess it has for generations of other children. Just note that the label contains a wheat warning.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put this aside to be given as a Christmas gift but did open it to check it all out. The plastic parts are adorable. My oldest will enjoy using it to make and decorate “cookies” and other treats. My youngest will enjoy squishing everything and making messes and mixing colors. But hey, it’s play doh!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and especially adults!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself. Who says you have to stop playing with Play-Doh just because you grew up?! Having a rough day? Put down your beer and get yourself a hunk of this childhood favorite in your hands instead. Great stress reliever. Still has that great smell. Just don’t eat it (you know you tried as a kid). I always feel like a new woman after a Play-Doh session!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of play
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my 4 year old. She absolutely loved it. She loved making shapes with the rolling pin and the cookie sheet. Her favorite part was the icing pusher. Only thing with it is it’s hard to get the leftover play dough out of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was thrilled. We had a great time with it. She particularly loves the little icing tube and plunger. It’s a little hard to get the dough out of the end, when changing colors, but that’s a minor issue. Definitely a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Fukumitsu

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shop play doh set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves play doh so I had to get this for her. This set is so adorable and it makes for hours of entertainment. She loves making little cookies and treats with this play doh set. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my nieces who love everything baking. Makes a nice “cookie”
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: We love these!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and hours of toddler entertainment. I think we will use these well into childhood beyond toddlerhood! One point of caution for ALL similar products that have magnets: keep away from babies and young toddlers who may put things in their mouths or chew! Although I have had no problems with these blocks, I have heard stories of other similar products with magnets breaking and babies swallowing the tiny magnets. Beware!! Only for older toddlers and children!
customer_reviews.author: shalini ayyagari

customer_reviews.title: Child is obsessed with it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old has had this for a few months, and she is not sick of it yet. I just got some fresh playdoh, because she mixed up some colors. She is very entertained with the different ways to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie T.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen this one yet in person. It was a gift for my granddaughter, so I had Amazon send it directly to her. She loved it and my daughter said it came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Something new for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: We tried play doh with our two year old. It's a fun activity. It has fun cutter shapes, the rolling pin & learning the colors. It's interactive with adult supervision.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bosque

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Toys for Tots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of board games (things geared towards family involvement) and items like this to donate to different charities during the holidays. This is a great gift to donate to a company like Toys for Tots. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and plays with it often. Not a lot of pieces to it but she doesn't seem to mind. The only thing she doesn't like is that it doesn't come with a smooth roller as well as the embossed one.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for all ages, because who doesn’t love play dough! Bright fun colors, easy to remove play dough from, and fun gift for the holidays
customer_reviews.author: pyxiegirlz

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and all pieces were included. Box was damaged but was discounted for that reason. I took a chance and glad i did, I am happy with this purchase. My grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Granny of 10

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap Play-Doh set
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you don't want to have to force dried Play-Doh out of every piece. There is enough different designs to keep the kid entertained while you help build every cookie shown on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn

customer_reviews.title: Great for "cooking" with grandma
customer_reviews.text: I do cooking sessions with my grand kids and this will be such fun to do with the toddlers who can't participate in the kitchen yet. Great idea! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Playdoh sweets filled with fun!
customer_reviews.text: Picked up on black friday. My daughter loves playdoh and this set is a perfect addition to her "cooking" sets. Arrived on time and great shape. Kids of all ages will enjoy making "cookies".
customer_reviews.author: Hotmessmama1012

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost 2 year old and she loved it and of course, now she is obsessed with Play-Doh. The Play-Doh molds are perfect to get them started.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gtz

customer_reviews.title: Fun playdoh set for the money
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with this - he's 2.5 years old. We've been making cookies and pretzels and icing non stop since he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hassler

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the grands
customer_reviews.text: While the size of the play-doh cans were much smaller than I expected, all in all this was a good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: The kids like Play-Doh so mom appreciated the gift. It’s different and better than just giving regular Play/Doh and stimulates a child to think about cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Day

customer_reviews.title: Small Happys
customer_reviews.text: The play doh cups are too small. My kid cannot make me big happy cookies. It’s only big enough for one cookie. 1 star because the play doh smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: Burgermeister Meisterburger

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Doh set!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter and I both enjoy making cookies and cakes together with this set Play Doh set. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. She loves to help bake and has enjoyed hours of play with this set. Purchased extra playdoh to go with it. She is enjoying it immensely.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh this is an awesome little play dough set! My 3yr old just loves it! She’s played with it everyday since Christmas. It’s so simple but there’s so much that can be Made with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this set
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old granddaughter spends a lot of time making her creations from this set. Got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: J Woods

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Cute set! Takes me back to childhood but with cool gadgets! High quality and great value! My 3 year old grandson loves playing with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Nora S Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Great PlayDough Fun
customer_reviews.text: A very nice Play Dough set. Tons of imagination can go into making all kinds of cookies and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Bought for icing tool and roller, dislike for those
customer_reviews.text: The markings on the roller are irritating, you roll it out with a roller that is difficult to use and then there are random marks on your dough. The icing tool is horrible, it has a gap between the end of it and where the plunger can reach, I had to find a chopstick for my kid to be able to push out all the playdoh
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good time Play-Doh time
customer_reviews.text: I mean Play-Doh is Play-Doh so hard surfaces are best hard floors are better. But it's great for kiddos and a good time for me to!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Like It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute, fun set. Just check the measurements and amount to be sure it’s what you want.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Plastic pieces are sturdy and hold up to typical abuse from a 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this set. Its play-doh. How can you go wrong. Plastic pieces are sturdy and hold up to typical abuse from a 2 year old. When it dries out, we add a bit of water. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my little cousin. Everyone loves Play-Doh! Nice set for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them busy
customer_reviews.text: My children loved everything about this and they play with it for hours — also children’s friends ages 2-10 love creating with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Great Christmas gift. And you have kids,I'd definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality time and fun
customer_reviews.text: This was for my niece. She loves it! We had it out and playing with it in minutes. Lots of hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Christi King

customer_reviews.title: play doh set
customer_reviews.text: Small dog containers, small set but complete. My niece enjoys this set.
customer_reviews.author: debbiesr65

customer_reviews.title: Great small gift
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for a toddler, teaches them dexterity and hand motions.
customer_reviews.author: Fobbulous

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was every thing I expected. Kids love play-doh. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun Play-doh set
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4-year-old daughter for Christmas and she loves it! She still plays with it often and loves to “bake.” I snagged it at a great price, and it’s a fun little set. There’s so many little molds to use, and the pan and rolling pin have been a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Bml12

customer_reviews.title: It’s Play-Doh, what else is there to say.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to play with this. It encourages creativity.

customer_reviews.title: c
customer_reviews.text: The kid loves to play, but it quickly dries out, playing a bottle a day

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Other sets have alot more to choose from in terms of pieces and creativity at the same price.

customer_reviews.title: Not as much fun.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t like this set as much as the pizza maker.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my niece. This was an excellent price for hours of fun!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea. My daughter loved this set. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift....she loves play dough. Excited to see little Dophie open it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice entertaining product for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Grandma and grandpa had fun showing granddaughter how to play with play dough !
customer_reviews.author: Luellla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves play dough. This was a great price for a good product!

customer_reviews.title: Fun set!
customer_reviews.text: The play pieces are fun and different that what we already have. Play-doh jars are small, but easily replaceable.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kids sits for hours playing cooking. Good for kids how also like playing w other pretend foods.
customer_reviews.author: Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse Deals Deliver Quality Products
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cookie creations play doh kit from the “used” section or “warehouse deals” as the new items were all out. The box was supposedly damaged but looked like new for me except a slight bend in the box, the product was brand new. It’s exactly what I wanted and the kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for my toddler, definitely a bit messy but it’s play doh so that’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 8 year old girl. Keeps her attention for a while... She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: DeNage Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Fun creative love play doh!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves play doh !! But it must stay in container when done or else it gets hard and there’s no use for it after. Other than that i personally Think it’s better than slime which is messy and play doh is easy to clean up .. love it
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Roller doesn't...roll
customer_reviews.text: Great playdoh set. Was disappointed that roller handles are fixed making it unroller like. Comes with the controversial frosting extruder. Kids don't think like that so I don't see the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jal11

customer_reviews.title: My 5 y.o. Loves this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters bday she is 5 and she loves play doh. She has been making donuts for us since she has gotten it. It’s great for creativity

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good fun

customer_reviews.text: Hours of toddler occupation! Coupled with YouTube play doh videos; A+++

customer_reviews.title: Fun play time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my great grandson and he loves making things for us. Yesterday he made me a pepperoni pizza and birthday cake. 😘

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My kids love play doh and this was a huge hit.

customer_reviews.text: Great set! Play Doh was fresh and in great condition. my 4 year old has been"cooking" all night long. thanks!

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: my kid loves it . play with it all the time

customer_reviews.title: The tools from the set are fun for kids but the actual doh included was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to give this set to my kids because it came with some different tools and 5 colors of Play-Doh but ended up not loving it.The play-doh is really soft and almost sticky so it can be hard to work with. It stuck to our hands and table much more than play-doh sets we have purchased in the past. The tools from the set are fun for kids but the actual doh included was disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute set! Bought this for an angel tree gift.

customer_reviews.title: Playdoh is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My girls have played with these sets for hours! It can get messy and be a pain, you definitely don't want it on carpet. But they have made really cute creations, the colors are nice and bright and the dough is easy to work with. The tools are fun and easy to use, I'm sure they have many hours of play ahead!

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining

customer_reviews.title: Best $15 I've spent.
customer_reviews.text: Super great buy. It keeps my ever-bored, extremely needy daughter busy for more than 30 minutes at a time. Bought it "used" with damage to packaging. All the pieces were there, all the playdoh was new. (I had fun with it too!) Best $15 I've spent.
customer_reviews.author: MajorHead

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Sweet Shoppe Cookie Creations
product_meta.description: Style:Cookie CreationsOpen your own make-believe bakery and create the most colorful Play-Doh cookies you can imagine! Make lots of pretend treats without the sweets right on the tray using the rolling pin and 4 cutters. Decorate your imaginary cookies with Play-Doh icing from the extruder and wacky candies from the half-molds around the tray. What kinds of crazy cookies can you create? Whether you want to decorate with rainbows, triple layers, or Play-Doh chocolate chips, the choice is yours! Play-Doh and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: High quality toys for children all ages
Everything you need to feel like you're in a real cookie bakery
Includes 4 cutters to create circle, square, star and heart-shaped Play-Doh cookies
Textured rolling pin lets you add fun patterns
Press pretend frosting with the extruder and create make-believe sandwich cookies
Includes tray, roller, 2-Piece extruder, 4 cutters, spatula and 5 cans of Play-Doh brand Modeling compound
Everything you need to feel like you're in a real cookie bakery
Includes 4 cutters to create circle, square, star and heart-shaped Play-Doh cookies
Textured rolling pin lets you add fun patterns
Press pretend frosting with the extruder and create make-believe sandwich cookies
Includes tray, roller, 2-piece extruder, 4 cutters, spatula and 5 cans of Play-Doh Brand Modeling Compound
